original_text: So Jehoshaphat and his men went to carry off their plunder, and they found among them a great amount of equipment and clothing and also articles of value—more than they could take away. There was so much plunder that it took three days to collect it.
korean_text: 여호사밧과 그의 백성이 가서 적군의 물건을 탈취할새 본즉 그 가운데에 재물과 의복과 보물이 많이 있으므로 각기 탈취하는데 그 물건이 너무 많아 능히 가져갈 수 없을 만큼 많으므로 사흘 동안에 거두어들이고

sentences.original_text: So Jehoshaphat and his men went
a great amount of equipment and clothing
more than they could take away
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 가져갈 수 있는 양보다 더 많은

sentences.original_text: that it took three days to collect it
